name: body-slam
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.black_white: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
